mapper.select: SELECT TKM.MAP_ID , TKM.UP_MAP_ID , TKM.USE_AT , TKM.CREATE_USER , TKM.CREATE_DATE , TKM.UPDATE_DATE , TKD.DATA_NM , TKD.DATA_CN FROM TNPSK_KNOW_MAP TKM JOIN TNPSK_KNOW_MAP_DATA TKMD ON TKM.MAP_ID = TKMD.MAP_ID JOIN TNPSK_KNOW_DATA TKD ON TKD.KNOW_DATA_ID = TKMD.KNOW_DATA_ID START WITH UP_MAP_ID = '00000001' CONNECT BY PRIOR TKM.MAP_ID = TKM.UP_MAP_ID WHERE TKM.MAP_ID = #{MAP_ID}
mapper.sql: SELECT TKDFS.FILE_ID , TKDFS.KNOW_DATA_ID , TKDFS.CREATE_USER , TKDFS.CREATE_DEPT , TA.PHY_SAVE_PATH_NM , TA.FILE_NM , TA.CREATE_DATE , TA.UPDATE_DATE , TKM.CREATE_DATE AS FLD_REG_DT , TKM.MAP_ID FROM TNPSK_KNOW_DATA_FILE_SAVE TKDFS JOIN TNZZA_ADDFILE TA ON TKDFS.FILE_ID = TA.FILE_ID JOIN TNPSK_KNOW_MAP_DATA TKMD ON TKMD.KNOW_DATA_ID = TKDFS.KNOW_DATA_ID JOIN TNPSK_KNOW_DATA TKD ON TKD.KNOW_DATA_ID = TKMD.KNOW_DATA_ID JOIN TNPSK_KNOW_MAP TKM ON TKM.MAP_ID = TKD.MAP_ID WHERE TKDFS.USE_AT = 'Y'
